definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Overtime payment shall be computed in accordance with the Labor Standards Law of R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 超時工作報酬計算方式，依中華民國勞動基準法。

sentences.english: I declare that I do not hold overseas Chinese status or ROC citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 本人保證未具僑生身份且不具中華民國國籍。

sentences.english: This contract shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the laws of the R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 本契約之解釋與履行應以中華民國法律爲準據法。

sentences.english: The president of R. O. C. are selected by all voters.
sentences.chinese: 中華民國總統是由民選產生。

sentences.english: It must pledge to abide by the ROC Securities and Exchange Act and related regulations, directives, and policies.
sentences.chinese: 遵守中華民國證券交易法及相關法令政策規定。

sentences.english: R. O. C. is a free country.
sentences.chinese: 中華民國是一個自由的國家。

sentences.english: Republic of door of a version for the double arc postal below.
sentences.chinese: 宮門一版中華民國郵政下邊爲雙線弧形。

sentences.english: Officially endorsed by the pro-democracy people in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 香港加入中華民國運動已得到全體泛民主派支持。

sentences.english: I guarantee that I do not hold overseas Chinese status or R. O. C. citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 本人保證未具僑生身份且不具中華民國國籍。

sentences.english: Paper presented at the annual conference Australasian Science Education Research Association. Fremantle, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 中華民國第二十二屆科學教育學術研討會，臺灣師大。

sentences.english: Apparently, mainlanders love the ROC flag.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，外省人愛中華民國國旗。

sentences.english: Sun Yat-sen wins an election for China republic military government generalissimo.
sentences.chinese: 孫中山當選爲中華民國軍政府大元帥。

sentences.english: Taipei is the capital of R. O. C.
sentences.chinese: 臺北是中華民國的首都。

sentences.english: I guarantee that I have never completed or been expelled from any academic programs in the ROC.
sentences.chinese: 本人保證在中華民國未曾完成申請就學學程或遭退學。
